title: Mortal.Kombat.X-dVs
description:
Mortal Kombat X {Repack}




Year of release : 2015
Genre : Arcade (Fighting) / 3D
Developer : NetherRealm Studios, High Voltage Software
Publisher : Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment
Publication Type : RePack
Language : pic|pic
Sound language :pic
Crack : NNM

System requirements:


Operating system : 64-bit: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10
Processor : Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
RAM : 3 GB
Video Card : NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 | AMD Radeon HD 5850
DirectX : Version 11
Free space on hard disk : 30 GB


Description :
  
Who is next ? Meet the continuation of the popular series of fighting games! 
Combining cinematic filing of unprecedented quality and updated game mechanics, 
Mortal Kombat X presents the world the most brutal of all Mortal Kombat. Players 
will be able to choose the first one of several options for each of the fighters, 
thereby determining the tactics and fighting style.

Features:

By the famous Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Rayden and Kano joined by new characters: Cassie 
Cage Kotal Kahn, Di'Vora and Ferrat and Torr.
Each character Mortal Kombat X before the battle chooses fighting style that defines 
the strategy of the fight, a set of special moves and abilities.
Events exciting story campaign taking place for 25 years after the end of the previous 
games in the series. The new grim stories prominent role assigned to a new generation 
of fighters, including Cassandra Cage (daughter of Johnny Cage and Sonya Blade), 
Jacqueline Briggs (daughter of Jackson "Jax" Briggs), Takahashi Takeda (son swordsman Kenshi) 
and Jin Kun, in direct relationship with Kung Lao.
In Mortal Kombat X was a place famous methods of X-ray, and the legendary finishing Fatality 
and Brutality. With improved graphics, animation and a new generation of exciting fights 
look particularly impressive!
